00073 static void ob_mx(void* par,
00074                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00075                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double* x)
00076 {
00077   *x += mass(G1->xi)*X->rho[0] * X->Q;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static void ob_my(void* par,
00081                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00082                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double* x)
00083 {
00084   *x += mass(G1->xi)*X->rho[1] * X->Q;
00085 }
00086 
00087 static void ob_mz(void* par,
00088                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00089                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double* x)
00090 {
00091   *x += mass(G1->xi)*X->rho[2] * X->Q;
00092 }

00095 static void ob_px(void* par,
00096                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00097                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double *p)
00098 {       
00099   *p += X->pi[0] * X->Q;
00100 }
00101 
00102 static void ob_py(void* par,
00103                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00104                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double *p)
00105 {       
00106   *p += X->pi[1] * X->Q;
00107 }

00109 static void ob_pz(void* par,
00110                   const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00111                   const GaussianAux* X, complex double *p)
00112 {       
00113   *p += X->pi[2] * X->Q;

00117 static void gob_mx(void* dummy,
00118                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00119                    const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX, 
00120                    complex double* mx, gradGaussian* dmx)
00121 {
00122   complex double mxme;
00123   int i;
00124 
00125   mxme = mass(G1->xi)*X->rho[0];
00126 
00127   *mx += mxme* X->Q;
00128 
00129   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00130     dmx->chi[i] += mxme* dX->dQ.chi[i];
00131 
00132   dmx->a += (mass(G1->xi)*dX->drho.a[0]*X->Q + mxme* dX->dQ.a);
00133   dmx->b[0] += mass(G1->xi)*dX->drho.b* X->Q;   
00134   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00135     dmx->b[i] += mxme*dX->dQ.b[i];
00136 }
00137

00141                    complex double* mx, gradGaussian* dmx)
00142 {

00152

00154   dmx->b[1] += mass(G1->xi)*dX->drho.b* X->Q;   
00155   for (i=0; i<3; i++)

00157 }

00176   for (i=0; i<3; i++)

00180 static void gob_px(void* dummy,
00181                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00182                    const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX, 
00183                    complex double* px, gradGaussian* dpx)
00184 {
00185   complex double pxme;
00186   int i;
00187 
00188   pxme = X->pi[0];
00189 
00190   *px += pxme* X->Q;
00191 
00192   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00193     dpx->chi[i] += pxme* dX->dQ.chi[i];
00194 
00195   dpx->a += (dX->dpi.a[0]*X->Q + pxme* dX->dQ.a);
00196   dpx->b[0] += dX->dpi.b* X->Q; 
00197   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00198     dpx->b[i] += pxme*dX->dQ.b[i];
00199 }

00222 static void gob_pz(void* dummy,
00223                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00224                    const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX, 
00225                    complex double* px, gradGaussian* dpx)
00226 {
00227   complex double pxme;
00228   int i;
00229 
00230   pxme = X->pi[2];
00231 
00232   *px += pxme* X->Q;
00233

00246 void calcConstraintX(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00247                      double* mxcon)
00248 {
00249   OneBodyOperator op_ob_mx = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_mx};
00250 
00251   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_mx, mxcon);
00252 }
